definition: the rear/far behind the front line

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: A wooden passenger car was abandoned at back yard of Wu-Shu-Lin Depot.
sentences.chinese: 廢棄於烏樹林車庫後方的糖鐵木製客車。

sentences.english: Epidural migration of a sequestrated disc to posterior epidural space is rare.
sentences.chinese: 遊離的髓核移位至後方硬膜外間隙是非常少見的。

sentences.english: Keep legs straight and move thighs back.
sentences.chinese: 保持雙腿伸直，大腿向後方移動。

sentences.english: Side mirrors are replaced by external cameras, located above the rear fenders .
sentences.chinese: 一面鏡子取代外部攝像機，上方後方墊。

sentences.english: The calcaneus projects backward behind the ankle .
sentences.chinese: 跟骨突出於踝部的後方。

sentences.english: Show the repair quotation and breakdown to insurer before commencing.
sentences.chinese: 維修估價單位必須先交保險公司比準後方可開工修理。

sentences.english: The contrast between the war front and the back area is always startling .
sentences.chinese: 戰爭時期，前後方的對比總是非常懸殊的。

sentences.english: Removable CF die cast rear subframe is light and strong.
sentences.chinese: 壓鑄後方可拆卸CF卡是重量輕，強度副車架。

sentences.english: You can make a practice swing behind the ball or next to the ball.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在球的左方或者是後方做空揮。

sentences.english: When I now want to make more wax rear intake crankcases I have some work.
sentences.chinese: 當我現在要多作蠟後方進氣曲軸箱，我有一些工作。

sentences.english: Levi's patch at back right waist.
sentences.chinese: 利維的補丁在右後方腰。

sentences.english: My head throbs behind my eyes and in the temple.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛後方和太陽穴有搏動的感覺。

sentences.english: Weights are likely to slide down the rear when they stay on the tail board.
sentences.chinese: 重物放在尾板上時，有向後方滑下的可能。

sentences.english: Behind it, lingular arterial trunk arised from left inferior lobar artery.
sentences.chinese: 其後方，舌動脈幹發自左肺下葉動脈。

sentences.english: Several more rear shock mounting position for better adjustability .
sentences.chinese: 多個後方休克安裝位置更好的適應性。

sentences.english: Further examination of the disc space showed residual osteophytes and posterior annulus.
sentences.chinese: 進一步檢查椎間隙發現有殘餘的骨贅和後方纖維環。

definition: behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
from now on/in the future/time to come
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
